original_text: Look at what happened in Babylonia. Its people have disappeared! The Assyrian army has made it a place for wild animals to live in. Their soldiers built hills of earth against the city's walls. They climbed over and they destroyed its strong buildings. Babylon's buildings became heaps of stones.
korean_text: 갈대아 사람의 땅을 보라 그 백성이 없어졌나니 곧 앗수르 사람이 그 곳을 들짐승이 사는 곳이 되게 하였으되 그들이 망대를 세우고 궁전을 헐어 황무하게 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: Look at what happened in Babylonia.
The Assyrian army has made it a place for wild animals to live in.
sentences.korean_translation: 앗시르 군대가 그곳을 야생 동물이 사는 곳으로 만들었다.

sentences.original_text: Their soldiers built hills of earth against the city's walls.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 군인들이 성벽에 흙 언덕을 쌓았다.

sentences.original_text: and they destroyed its strong buildings.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그 견고한 건물들을 파괴했다.

sentences.original_text: Babylon's buildings became heaps of stones.
